Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Located on Richmond’s historic Tobacco Row
Creative office space with high-end finishes
Walkable nearby amenities including dining, entertainment and lodging
One block from GRTC Pulse transit station

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Approximately 5,000 SF Creative Office Space For Lease - Located on Richmond’s Historic Tobacco Row

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: American Cigar Building 2300 East Cary Street - Image 1

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- 20-story, 908,500 SF Class A Office Building with street-level retail space
- 1,200 employees on-site
- 11,100 daytime workers in walkable trade area
- Growing residential population
- Great street-level retail exposure
- Regular city events, including the Grand Illumination, Richmond Folk Festival (± 200,000 attendees), and Anthem Richmond Marathon (± 15,000 entries)
- Over 1,700 public parking spaces within four city blocks
- 1,776 SF available for lease

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail Space in Richmond's Newest Skyscraper

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: 1,200 SF of Retail Space Available For Lease

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
+ Planned 6,200 SF retail center anchored by Dunkin' Donuts

+ 1,200 - 3,700 SF available

+ Excellent visibility location at Brook and Wilkinson Road

+ 92 Acre, $2.3B, Arena-anchored, Mixed-Use Development at I-95 and Parham Road planned over the next 5 years

+ Easy access to major highways

+ Estimated delivery 1st quarter 2021

+ Strong nearby daytime population

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail Space on Heavily Traveled Brook Road Corridor

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
+ 9,160 SF retail center located in busy Willow Lawn submarket
+ Suite 5243 - 2,440 SF - Former restaurant space with walk-in cooler and freezer in place
+ Great visibility fronting W. Broad Street
+ Additional customer parking at rear of building
+ Join Better Med Urgent Care, Fantastic Sam's, and Red Nails

- Available For Lease or For Sale
- Zoned C-3
- 8 repair bays
- 20 parking spaces
- Call agent for pricing, or to schedule a tour, business is still operating
